sentences.sentence: Dolly was the only lamb born from 277 fusions of oocytes with udder cells.
sentences.translation: 多利是277个卵细胞与乳腺细胞融合而成的唯一一只羊羔。

sentences.sentence: AIM: To observe the effect of the environmental temperature on spindles in MII oocytes.
sentences.translation: 目的：观察环境温度的改变对MII期人卵纺锤体结构的影响。

sentences.sentence: In the future, it may also be possible to generate human oocytes from male iPS cells in vitro.
sentences.translation: 在未来，人类男性诱导性多能干细胞可能在试管中产生卵母细胞。
